name: Prospective Commercial ASHP (FS) CC
_description: Ultra-efficient heat pump target, switch fossil-based heating and associated cooling to heat pumps, cold-climate

market_entry_year_source.notes: Targeted year of breakthrough technology market entry

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Most aggressive performance level expected to be achievable via breakthrough R&D

installed_cost_source.notes: Cost that yields a 5 year overall payback period for given performance level and market entry year

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2018 - Table E1 -  Major fuels consumption by end use, 2018
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Heating fraction excludes portion of heating consumption in building where cooling is served by a chiller or district chilled water (703 TBtus space heating w/ chiller/district cooling out of 2167 TBtus space heating across all buildings), under the assumption that this service is not replacable by the targeted heat pump; cooling fraction excludes cooling in buildings that use electric source of primary heating (221 TBtus cooling in buildings with electric primary heating / 589 TBtus cooling in all buildings).
